lead_paragraph: A husband and wife were convicted Tuesday of planning to bomb civilian targets in London to mark the 10th anniversary of the attacks on the city’s transit system.

headline.main: Britain: Couple Is Convicted of Planning Bomb Attack
headline.print_headline: Britain: Couple Is Convicted of Planning Bomb Attack

snippet: A husband and wife were convicted Tuesday of planning to bomb civilian targets in London to mark the 10th anniversary of the attacks on the city’s transit system.
